content.question: Predict the effect of adding a noncompetitive inhibitor to the reaction mixture on the rate of reaction at a high substrate concentration. Support your prediction by describing how a noncompetitive inhibitor affects the structure and function of an enzyme.

frqParts.text: Predict the effect of adding a noncompetitive inhibitor to the reaction mixture on the rate of reaction at a high substrate concentration. Support your prediction by describing how a noncompetitive inhibitor affects the structure and function of an enzyme.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
